quoteText: We will get your explicit opt-in consent before we share your personal data with any company outside Jagex for marketing purposes.
title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties
tosdr.tldr:
JAGEX Your personal information may be shared with third parties.
The opt-in only appears to be valid for marketing purposes, your data might be shared for other reasons.
